reviewText: Ok, How do I say this, The production value of this movie sucks.  Bad lighting, Bad audio, Bad story, Bad acting.  BUT, If you like hot sex scenes that are never seen in anything but porno, you will like this.  If you like kink, you will like this.  If you like gross, you will like this.  I don't like gross, but kink is ok.  So I made myself remember this was fake blood and guts, and the chemestry between these two guys is so hot.  You have to have a sick idea of a good movie, luckily I do.  I would recommend it if you do also.

I can find nothing good to say about this movie, so I will not say anything about it.
Except that I cannot recommend it to anyone regardless of sex, sexual orientation
or age.
